p: The rizhomes of the Z. zerumbet were collected in a rural area surrounding the city of Manaus/AM, located at BR-174, points P01 to P02, latitude 24132, 03789 S and longitude 600931,40854 W, according to geographic coordination. After that, an exsiccate was sent to the herbarium of the National Institute of Amazonian Research (INPA) for proper identification and comparison with the exsiccate previously identified by Prof. Dr. Paul Maas (Department of Plant Ecology and Evolutionary Biology; Herbarium University of Utrecht), which is deposited in the herbarium under N°. 186913.
